1.content:
Amodeus stared down from his tower. Mere weeks ago, he had been a washed-up scientist. He and his science team had seen Mewtwo.

They had been dismissed. Amodeus had sworn vengeance. He got it.

Soon after, he had developed invented a technology that could turn people into Pokemon. Now Amodeus was leader of Team Rocket. His attack soon reached global proportions. All who stood against him became Pokemon.

"How do you like THAT, Giovanni?" he sneered at a Magikarp (which was ONCE Giovanni.). He pulled out a device he had been tinkering with and pressed the red button.

A purple portal opened. Amodeus jumped. He wasn't expecting that...but curiosity soon overtook him.

He picked up a PokeRay, walked into the portal, and wound up in the universe of...
1.title: A tyrant's origin

11.content: Amodeus came out of the portal and found himself in a forest. He grinned, there would be many creatures here to transform. Suddenly he heard footsteps. He jumped behind a bush and peered out and saw..
11.title: Digimon

choices: the original with tai agumon and the others
the second part of the origina with davis veemon and his friends
112.content: okay going to break the fourth wall here, now which season did he even end up in
112.title: A Human

choices: ...emerged from a mountain with faces gigantic faces etched into the side.
...been seen by someone while using the mysterious device.
13.content:
Amodeus exited the portal and found himself in a world much unlike his own. It was much too pleasant.

He did a quick survey of his surroundings, only to discover he had...
13.title: Naruto

131.content:
Trees and massive structures completely envelope Amodeus as he explores this twisted region of the universe. Or maybe it was a different universe entirely! Amodeus looked completely out of place. He wore no headband, while everyone around him seemed to have one somewhere on there body, most with a spiral sort of pattern on them. "Damn it," he muttered to himself. He adjusted his Pokeray and said "I'll need a disguise, and I know exactly how to acquire one," in a mischievous sort of way.

Near where Amodeus was concealing himself, a ninja walked by, not know the danger he was in. Amodeus noticed this boy was wearing an outfit he could use. The ninja was...
131.title: ...emerged from a mountain with faces gigantic ...

14.content:
Amodeus found himself in what appeared to be a regular city, but not one he was familiar with.

"It looks like an average place, but it has almost no pokemon." he noticed "Let's see if I can fix that problem."

The new boss of Team Rocket then began to scout around for good victims, using a special pair of binoculars, he found a very interesting one.

Who is it?
14.title: Sailor Moon

141.content:
He immediately saw a blonde girl with meatball-style hair running around in a Sailor suit.

"Who in their right mind would-never mind." he murmured as he readied his Poke-Gun. He took aim and ALMOST shot, but thought better of it. He HAD to keep a low profile here.

He put the binoculars away and walked into the city. He came into contact with the girl and said...
141.title: Sailor Moon

1411.content:
"Hi. I'm Amodeus. Who're you?" the man said, trying to trick the girl.

The girl was taken aback but replied anyway. "My name's Serena 'Usagi' Tsukino, but please call me Serena." The sailor scout said, while not in said form.

"Ah, Well you see, I'm a scientist, but I need your help." Amodeus said stepping back. "Could you stay there?"

"Sure..." Serena says, still weirded out. Amodeus laughs as he charges up the ray.

He then shot it at Serena, who became...
1411.title: "Hi. I'm Amodeus. Who're you?" ...

14113.content:
Amodeus smiled, "It worked!"

The white glow surrounding Serena cleared and revealed a...
14113.title: other pokemon

1551.title: Romance and Comedy

15521.content: Whom do you want to transform?
15521.title: Who?

info.brief_description: An interdimensional villain turns anime characters into Pokemon.
info.description:
Amodeus, an interdimensional villain, has found a science that turns humans into Pokemon. After conquering the Pokemon world, he finds a portal device that allows him to travel into other anime universes...and lead a conquest.

Will victory or defeat await him? You decide.

Rules:

-No gay content
-No constant sex (if you must, keep it far between)
-Descriptions required.
-More than one paragraph also required.
-NO foul-language.
-Keep characters in character if you can.
-Enjoy!
